title: Remove 'Made by you' branding from bottom of app

requirements.summary: Remove all 'Made by you' / 'Made with AI' branding and watermarks from the application footer and generated HTML output
acceptanceCriteria: No 'Made by', 'Made with', or similar attribution/watermark text is visible at the bottom of any page in the app.
The Noventra.ai watermark string in frontend/src/services/llmService.ts is removed or left empty.
All other functionality and layout remain unaffected.

file_operations.description: Remove or empty the Noventra.ai watermark string constant that gets injected into AI-generated HTML output. Locate the watermark definition (likely a string constant containing 'Made by' or 'Noventra.ai' attribution) and either delete it entirely or set it to an empty string. Ensure the generateHTML function or similar methods no longer append watermark text to generated content.

Review the shared nav layout and remove any footer component or branding element displaying 'Made by you' text at the bottom of the application. If a Footer component is rendered, remove it from the layout. Ensure the navigation layout only contains Logo, ShareButton, and LoginButton without any attribution footer.

Remove any 'Made by you' or attribution text from the marketing landing page footer section. Check the bottom of the page for footer elements containing branding text and delete them, ensuring the CTA buttons and feature sections remain intact.
